title: Baked Potato Fries Recipe for Kids and Toddler
content:
Most of the kids love french fries, maha is no exception. She loves it so much. But since it is deep fried I kind of stay away from it, finally I made this baked version. It is so easy to make and turns out crunchy too.

title: Babies Curd Rice Recipe - Yogurt Rice Recipe for Kids And Babies
content:
The key to making a tasty and kids friendly curd rice or yogurt rice is to add less yogurt and more milk which makes it tastier.
So give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

title: Healthy Vegetable Stir Fry Recipe for Kids and Toddlers
content: This is a great dish to include veggies in your little one's diet. You can add whatever veggies you like in this.
